sentences.sContent: How would a new round of trade liberalization help poor countries?
sentences.sContent_eng: How would a new round of trade liberalization help poor countries?
sentences.sCn: 新一轮的贸易自由化将如何帮助贫困国家呢？

sentences.sContent: New steps should be made in trade facilitation and liberalization to boost the integration of the three economies.
sentences.sContent_eng: New steps should be made in trade facilitation and liberalization to boost the integration of the three economies.
sentences.sCn: 在贸易促进和自由化方面迈出新的步伐，推动三国朝着经济一体化方向发展。

sentences.sContent: Fukuyama: We’ve been talking until we’re blue in the face about the kind of liberalization you’ve just mentioned, and of course about revising the value of the renminbi.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fukuyama: We’ve been talking until we’re blue in the face about the kind of liberalization you’ve just mentioned, and of course about revising the value of the renminbi.
sentences.sCn: 福山： 我们此前一直在交谈，直到谈到刚刚你提及的那类自由化问题，当然，这是指修正人民币的价值，此时我们的脸色都有点难堪。

words.tran: 自由主义的；慷慨的；不拘泥的；宽大的
自由的；自由论者的；持自由论的
大方地；自由地；公平地；充足地
自由主义；开明的思想或见解
慷慨，大方；心胸宽阔，胸怀广阔
浪荡子；性行为放纵者；放荡不羁者；玩乐者；自由思想家
自由意志主义者；行动自由论者
自由主义；自由意志论；公民拥有充分自由权论
